column4: Hi there! Is there anyone who could help me installing an ATI graphicscard? I've got an ATI Radeon 9600XT - running on a Asus P4P800 Mainboard. I apt-get'ted the fglrx drivers already.
But it stil does not work.
hrm - I'm an absolutly newbie in Linux. Don't know exactly :)
Oh that page. Jep I ran through it!
First I tried the second way - with installing the drivers from ati.com - and then the first one.
sorry missed the question, but what are you trying to do with which card?
you have single or dual monitors?
do you know what driver you are using fglrx, ati or radeon?
I think I recently installed fglrx - but it seems that it does not work
Well I have a Radeon 9000Pro, dual monitors
I found flgrx to be a pain
my card is a Radeon 9600 XT, single monitor
so switched from the fglrx to radeon
you shouldn't have to do anything, comes with ubuntu
